title: FastStore - June, 2022
description: New Hero and Dropdown components. Also, enhancements in the FastStore API and SDK were implemented to allow page error handling and price range filtering on PLPs.

title: Base Store - May, 2022
description: New cart-related events are now being tracked, and enhancements in the LCP score have been implemented. Also, more components have been updated to use the Base Store theming structure.

title: FastStore - May , 2022
description: New OutOfStock and ProductCard components added to the FastStore UI. Also, improvements in the FastStore API now allow fetching additional properties of a product.

title: Changes in the secure subdomain configuration
description: Check the recent changes in the secure subdomain configuration.
